activities.name: Until SQL POOL is Paused or Online

expression.value: @or(bool(startswith(activity('Check for changed SQLPool Status').Output.Properties.status,'Paused')),Bool(startswith(activity('Check for changed SQLPool Status').Output.Properties.status,'Online')))

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStartTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionLineItemCompletedTimestamp as timestamp,
		ProductId as integer,
		ItemSku as string,
		UniversalProductCode as decimal(10,0),
		Quantity as decimal(10,0),
		UnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		PreorderIndicator as integer,
		ProductListPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionProductPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		FreeSampleIndicator as boolean,
		TotalTransactionLineItemAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineEntryMethodId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemScanTimestamp as timestamp,
		PosDeviceId as integer,
		ScaleUsedIndicator as boolean,
		ScaleMeasuredItemWeight as integer,
		WeightUomId as integer,
		ScaleQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineVolume as decimal(10,0),
		VolumeUomId as integer,
		ProductPriceOverrideIndicator as boolean,
		ProductPriceAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ProductPriceAdjustmentPercentage as decimal(10,0),
		TotalLineItemAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		LineItemNote as string,
		QuantityBooked as integer,
		QuantityBilled as integer,
		QuantityBacklog as integer,
		AcceptedQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		QuantityCancelled as integer,
		QuantityReturned as integer,
		BookedTimestamp as timestamp,
		BilledTimestamp as timestamp,
		CancelledTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnedTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		RequestedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedAvailableForPickupTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		ShipmentChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShipmentCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		PickPackageCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShippingLocationId as integer,
		ShipmentMethodId as integer,
		DropShipLineItemIndicator as boolean,
		WaybillNumber as integer,
		TareWeight as integer,
		NetWeight as integer,
		ShipCompleteIndicator as boolean,
		EarliestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		LatestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnTransactionId as integer,
		ReturnTransactionLineItemId as integer,
		ReturnToStockIndicator as boolean,
		ReturnToStoreIndicator as boolean,
		ApprovedByEmployeeId as integer,
		SalesChannelId as integer,
		DistributionChannelId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemTypeId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStatusId as integer,
		FuelPumpId as integer,
		BuyClassId as integer,
		PromotionId as integer,
		PharmacyId as integer,
		PharmacyTransactionId as integer,
		PromotionOfferId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentUTC(), -180)),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'TransactionLineItem.cdm.json/TransactionLineItem',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'TransactionLineItem',
	corpusPath: 'idwdemo2LogicalSource',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'source',
	folderPath: 'idwdemo2PhysicalSourcePE/TransactionLineItem',
	fileSystem: 'source') ~> TransactionLineItemDeltaSource
source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionReceivedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionEntryTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		CreditCheckTimestamp as timestamp,
		RequestedDeliveryDate as date,
		CommittedDeliveryDate as date,
		ActualDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShipmentToName as string,
		ShipmentToLocationId as integer,
		TransactionConfirmationNumber as string,
		IdentificationCheckedIndicator as boolean,
		IdentificationId as integer,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalAdjustmentPercentage as decimal(10,0),
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalShippingChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionTotalTaxAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionRoundingAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionTotalInvoicedAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalCommissionsPayableAmount as decimal(10,0),
		SplitCommissionsIndicator as boolean,
		RequestedShipmentCarrierName as string,
		AlternateCarrierAcceptableIndicator as boolean,
		ShipCompleteIndicator as boolean,
		AcknowledgementRequiredIndicator as boolean,
		ExpediteTransactionIndicator as boolean,
		DropShipmentIndicator as boolean,
		ActualShipmentCarrierName as string,
		TotalWeight as integer,
		TotalFreightChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		UnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		EarliestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		LatestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryInstructions as string,
		CustomerCreditCheckNote as string,
		MessageToCustomer as string,
		CustomerId as integer,
		CustomerAccountId as integer,
		PurchasingChannelId as integer,
		SalesChannelId as integer,
		DistributionChannelId as integer,
		MarketingEventId as integer,
		AdvertisingEventId as integer,
		PromotionId as integer,
		TransactionTypeId as integer,
		BillingCycleId as integer,
		MerchantId as integer,
		CustomerIdentificationMethodId as integer,
		TransactionClassificationId as integer,
		TransactionProcessingStatusId as integer,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		TransactionExecutionMethodId as integer,
		TransactionPriorityId as integer,
		TransactionTaxStatusId as integer,
		WebPageUrl as string,
		SessionId as integer,
		PointOfSaleId as integer,
		StoreId as integer,
		WarehouseId as integer,
		ResponsibilityCenterId as integer,
		TransactionNote as string,
		ShipmentMethodId as integer,
		DeviceId as integer,
		SoftwareProductId as integer,
		SoftwareProductVersionNumber as integer,
		ApprovedByEmployeeId as integer,
		PromotionOfferId as integer,
		LoyaltyCardId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: 'Transaction.cdm.json/Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction',
	corpusPath: 'idwdemo2LogicalSource',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'source',
	folderPath: 'idwdemo2PhysicalSourcePE/Transaction',
	fileSystem: 'source') ~> TransactionSource
TransactionLineItemDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		TransactionLineItemId,
		ProductId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TransactionLineItem
TransactionSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Transaction
TransactionLineItem, Transaction join(TransactionLineItem@TransactionId == Transaction@TransactionId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTransaction
JoinTransaction aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId,
		ProductId),
	PurchaseCount = count(TransactionLineItemId)) ~> AggregatedTransactionLineItem
AggregatedTransactionLineItem select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		ProductId,
		PurchaseCount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreAlterRowCustomerProductInsight
PreAlterRowCustomerProductInsight alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> CustomerProductInsight
CustomerProductInsight sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerId','ProductId'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true) ~> CustomerProductInsightSink

Transaction, TransactionLineItem join(Transaction@TransactionId == TransactionLineItem@TransactionId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTransactionLineItem
JoinTransactionLineItem aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId),
	TransactionCount = count(Transaction@TransactionId),
		TotalTransactionAmount = sum(TotalTransactionLineItemAmount)) ~> AggregatedTransaction

		CustomerId,
		TransactionCount,
		TotalTransactionAmount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,

source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStartTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionLineItemCompletedTimestamp as timestamp,
		ProductId as integer,
		ItemSku as string,
		UniversalProductCode as decimal(10,0),
		Quantity as decimal(10,0),
		UnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		PreorderIndicator as integer,
		ProductListPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionProductPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		FreeSampleIndicator as boolean,
		TotalTransactionLineItemAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineEntryMethodId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemScanTimestamp as timestamp,
		PosDeviceId as integer,
		ScaleUsedIndicator as boolean,
		ScaleMeasuredItemWeight as integer,
		WeightUomId as integer,
		ScaleQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineVolume as decimal(10,0),
		VolumeUomId as integer,
		ProductPriceOverrideIndicator as boolean,
		ProductPriceAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ProductPriceAdjustmentPercentage as decimal(10,0),
		TotalLineItemAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		LineItemNote as string,
		QuantityBooked as integer,
		QuantityBilled as integer,
		QuantityBacklog as integer,
		AcceptedQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		QuantityCancelled as integer,
		QuantityReturned as integer,
		BookedTimestamp as timestamp,
		BilledTimestamp as timestamp,
		CancelledTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnedTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		RequestedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedAvailableForPickupTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		ShipmentChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShipmentCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		PickPackageCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShippingLocationId as integer,
		ShipmentMethodId as integer,
		DropShipLineItemIndicator as boolean,
		WaybillNumber as integer,
		TareWeight as integer,
		NetWeight as integer,
		ShipCompleteIndicator as boolean,
		EarliestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		LatestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnTransactionId as integer,
		ReturnTransactionLineItemId as integer,
		ReturnToStockIndicator as boolean,
		ReturnToStoreIndicator as boolean,
		ApprovedByEmployeeId as integer,
		SalesChannelId as integer,
		DistributionChannelId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemTypeId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStatusId as integer,
		FuelPumpId as integer,
		BuyClassId as integer,
		PromotionId as integer,
		PharmacyId as integer,
		PharmacyTransactionId as integer,
		PromotionOfferId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: 'TransactionLineItem.cdm.json/TransactionLineItem',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'TransactionLineItem',
	corpusPath: 'idwdemoLogicalSource',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'source',
	folderPath: 'idwdemoPhysicalSourcePE/TransactionLineItem',
	fileSystem: 'source') ~> TransactionLineItemSource
TransactionDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Transaction
TransactionLineItemSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		TotalTransactionLineItemAmount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TransactionLineItem
Transaction, TransactionLineItem join(Transaction@TransactionId == TransactionLineItem@TransactionId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTransactionLineItem
JoinTransactionLineItem aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId),
	TransactionCount = count(Transaction@TransactionId),
		TotalTransactionAmount = sum(TotalTransactionLineItemAmount)) ~> AggregatedTransaction
AggregatedTransaction select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		TransactionCount,
		TotalTransactionAmount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerTransactionInsight
CustomerTransactionInsight sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'CustomerTransactionInsight.cdm.json/CustomerTransactionInsight',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'CustomerTransactionInsight',
	folderPath: 'idwdemoPhysicalTargetPE/CustomerTransactionInsight',
	fileSystem: 'target',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: 'idwdemoLogicalTarget',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'target',
	truncate: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CustomerTransactionInsightSink

properties.description: Time dimension tablosunu generate etmek iin kulalnacamz script

content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#DateTmp') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE #DateTmp
END

CREATE TABLE #DateTmp (DateKey datetime NOT NULL)

-- Create temp table with all the dates we will use
DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
SET @StartDate = '01/01/2005'
SET @EndDate = getdate() 
DECLARE @LoopDate datetime
SET @LoopDate = @StartDate

WHILE @LoopDate <= @EndDate
BEGIN
INSERT INTO #DateTmp VALUES
    (
        @LoopDate
    )  		  
    SET @LoopDate = DateAdd(dd, 1, @LoopDate)
END

INSERT INTO dbo.DimDate 
SELECT
CAST(CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DateKey, 112) AS int) , -- date key
        DateKey, -- date alt key
        Year(DateKey), -- calendar year
        datepart(qq, DateKey), -- calendar quarter
        Month(DateKey), -- month number of year
        datename(mm, DateKey), -- month name
        Day(DateKey),  -- day number of month
        datepart(dw, DateKey), -- day number of week
        datename(dw, DateKey), -- day name of week
        CASE
            WHEN Month(DateKey) < 7 THEN Year(DateKey)
            ELSE Year(DateKey) + 1
        END, -- Fiscal year (assuming fiscal year runs from Jul to June)
        CASE
            WHEN Month(DateKey) IN (1, 2, 3) THEN 3
            WHEN Month(DateKey) IN (4, 5, 6) THEN 4
            WHEN Month(DateKey) IN (7, 8, 9) THEN 1
            WHEN Month(DateKey) IN (10, 11, 12) THEN 2
        END -- fiscal quarter 
    FROM #DateTmp
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
TOP100*
FROM
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://masidwadls.dfs.core.windows.net/source/idwdemo2PhysicalSourcePE/Transaction/Data/Transaction.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )AS[result]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Table]
(
    col1 int NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (col1),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[FactResellerSales](
    [ProductKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [OrderDateKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [DueDateKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [ShipDateKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [ResellerKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [EmployeeKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [PromotionKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [CurrencyKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [SalesTerritoryKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [SalesOrderNumber] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL,
    [SalesOrderLineNumber] [tinyint] NOT NULL,
    [RevisionNumber] [tinyint] NULL,
    [OrderQuantity] [smallint] NULL,
    [UnitPrice] [money] NULL,
    [ExtendedAmount] [money] NULL,
    [UnitPriceDiscountPct] [float] NULL,
    [DiscountAmount] [float] NULL,
    [ProductStandardCost] [money] NULL,
    [TotalProductCost] [money] NULL,
    [SalesAmount] [money] NULL,
    [TaxAmt] [money] NULL,
    [Freight] [money] NULL,
    [CarrierTrackingNumber] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [CustomerPONumber] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [OrderDate] [datetime] NULL,
    [DueDate] [datetime] NULL,
    [ShipDate] [datetime] NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([SalesOrderNumber]),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimReseller](
    [ResellerKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [GeographyKey] [int] NULL,
    [ResellerAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [Phone] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [BusinessType] [varchar](20) NOT NULL,
    [ResellerName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [NumberEmployees] [int] NULL,
    [OrderFrequency] [char](1) NULL,
    [OrderMonth] [tinyint] NULL,
    [FirstOrderYear] [int] NULL,
    [LastOrderYear] [int] NULL,
    [ProductLine] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [AddressLine1] [nvarchar](60) NULL,
    [AddressLine2] [nvarchar](60) NULL,
    [AnnualSales] [money] NULL,
    [BankName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [MinPaymentType] [tinyint] NULL,
    [MinPaymentAmount] [money] NULL,
    [AnnualRevenue] [money] NULL,
    [YearOpened] [int] NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimEmployee](
    [EmployeeKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [ParentEmployeeKey] [int] NULL,
    [EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [SalesTerritoryKey] [int] NULL,
    [FirstName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [LastName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [MiddleName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [NameStyle] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [Title] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [HireDate] [date] NULL,
    [BirthDate] [date] NULL,
    [LoginID] [nvarchar](256) NULL,
    [EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [Phone] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [MaritalStatus] [nchar](1) NULL,
    [EmergencyContactName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [EmergencyContactPhone] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [SalariedFlag] [bit] NULL,
    [Gender] [nchar](1) NULL,
    [PayFrequency] [tinyint] NULL,
    [BaseRate] [money] NULL,
    [VacationHours] [smallint] NULL,
    [SickLeaveHours] [smallint] NULL,
    [CurrentFlag] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [SalesPersonFlag] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [DepartmentName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [StartDate] [date] NULL,
    [EndDate] [date] NULL,
    [Status] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [EmployeePhoto] [varbinary](max) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED INDEX (EmployeeKey)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimProduct](
    [ProductKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [ProductAlternateKey] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] NULL,
    [WeightUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) NULL,
    [SizeUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) NULL,
    [EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [SpanishProductName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [FrenchProductName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [StandardCost] [money] NULL,
    [FinishedGoodsFlag] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [Color] [nvarchar](15) NOT NULL,
    [SafetyStockLevel] [smallint] NULL,
    [ReorderPoint] [smallint] NULL,
    [ListPrice] [money] NULL,
    [Size] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [SizeRange] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [Weight] [float] NULL,
    [DaysToManufacture] [int] NULL,
    [ProductLine] [nchar](2) NULL,
    [DealerPrice] [money] NULL,
    [Class] [nchar](2) NULL,
    [Style] [nchar](2) NULL,
    [ModelName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [LargePhoto] [varbinary](max) NULL,
    [EnglishDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [FrenchDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [ChineseDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [ArabicDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [HebrewDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [ThaiDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [GermanDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [JapaneseDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [TurkishDescription] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [StartDate] [datetime] NULL,
    [EndDate] [datetime] NULL,
    [Status] [nvarchar](7) NULL    
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED INDEX (ProductKey)
);
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimGeography](
    [GeographyKey] [int] NOT NULL,
    [City] [nvarchar](30) NULL,
    [StateProvinceCode] [nvarchar](3) NULL,
    [StateProvinceName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [CountryRegionCode] [nvarchar](3) NULL,
    [EnglishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [SpanishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [FrenchCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [PostalCode] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [SalesTerritoryKey] [int] NULL,
    [IpAddressLocator] [nvarchar](15) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
GO

COPY INTO [dbo].[DimProduct]
FROM 'https://solliancepublicdata.blob.core.windows.net/dataengineering/dp-203/awdata/DimProduct.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='|',
    FIELDQUOTE='',
    ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
    ENCODING = 'UTF16'
);

WITH (

    FIELDQUOTE='',

COPY INTO [dbo].[DimGeography]
FROM 'https://solliancepublicdata.blob.core.windows.net/dataengineering/dp-203/awdata/DimGeography.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='|',
    FIELDQUOTE='',
    ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
    ENCODING = 'UTF16'
);
GO

COPY INTO [dbo].[FactResellerSales]
FROM 'https://solliancepublicdata.blob.core.windows.net/dataengineering/dp-203/awdata/FactResellerSales.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='|',
    FIELDQUOTE='',
    ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
    ENCODING = 'UTF16'
);
GO

SELECT
    Coalesce(p.[ModelName], p.[EnglishProductName]) AS [Model]
    ,g.City AS ResellerCity
    ,g.StateProvinceName AS StateProvince
    ,Year(f.OrderDate) AS CalendarYear
    ,CASE
        WHEN Month(f.OrderDate) < 7 THEN Year(f.OrderDate)
        ELSE Year(f.OrderDate) + 1
    END AS FiscalYear -- Fiscal year runs from Jul to June)
    ,Month(f.OrderDate) AS [Month]
    ,Sum(f.OrderQuantity) AS Quantity
    ,Sum(f.ExtendedAmount) AS Amount
    ,Approx_count_distinct(f.SalesOrderNumber) AS UniqueOrders  
FROM
    [dbo].[FactResellerSales] f
INNER JOIN [dbo].[DimReseller] r
    ON f.ResellerKey = r.ResellerKey
INNER JOIN [dbo].[DimGeography] g
    ON r.GeographyKey = g.GeographyKey
INNER JOIN [dbo].[DimProduct] p
    ON f.[ProductKey] = p.[ProductKey]
GROUP BY
    Coalesce(p.[ModelName], p.[EnglishProductName])
    ,g.City
    ,g.StateProvinceName
    ,Year(f.OrderDate)
    ,CASE
        WHEN Month(f.OrderDate) < 7 THEN Year(f.OrderDate)
        ELSE Year(f.OrderDate) + 1
    END
    ,Month(f.OrderDate)
ORDER BY Amount DESC

COPY INTO [dbo].[DimProductCategory]
FROM 'https://solliancepublicdata.blob.core.windows.net/dataengineering/dp-203/awdata/DimProductCategory.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='|',
